verses.name: Acts 5:11
verses.text: And great fear came upon all the church, and upon as many as heard these things.

verses.name: Acts 5:12
verses.text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people; (and they were all with one accord in Solomon’s porch.

verses.name: Acts 5:13
verses.text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them: but the people magnified them.

verses.name: Acts 5:14
verses.text: And believers were the more added to the Lord, multitudes both of men and women.)
